content: the same double_crochet st ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside ch1 sk1 sl1 into the 3rd chain the stars a further 13 14 16 18 made at the beginning of the round times dc1 into the next double_crochet st 46 48 52 56 sts ch1 dc1 into the same double_crochet st ch1 sk1 sl1 into the 3rd chain 18 using col e ch3 ch1 sk1 hdc1 made at the beginning of the round into the next double_crochet st ch1 sk1 h repeat 38 40 44 48 sts the section inside the stars a further 21 22 24 26 times sl1 into the 16 #woolandthegang eng 3rd chain made at the beginning of the the section inside the stars a round further 25 26 28 30 times sl1 into the 3rd chain made at the beginning of 19 using col a repeat step 18 twice more the round 20 increase round using col b ch3 ch1 26 using col a repeat step 25 twice more sk1 dc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 dc1 into the same double_crochet st ch1 27 using col b repeat step 25 twice more sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside 28 using col c repeat step 25 twice more the stars a further 19 20 22 24 times dc1 into the next double_crochet st 29 using col d repeat step 25 twice more ch1 dc1 into the same double_crochet st ch1 sk1 sl1 into the 3rd chain 30 using col e repeat step 25 twice more made at the beginning of the round 50 52 56 60 sts 31 repeat steps 26 to 29 once more 21 using col b ch3 ch1 sk1 hdc1 32 cut the yarn approx 15cm/6 from into the next double_crochet st ch1 sk1 h repeat the last stitch pull on the loop on the section inside the stars a further your crochet hook until the end pops 23 24 26 28 times sl1 into the through - you have now secured the 3rd chain made at the beginning of the last stitch round you will now rejoin your yarn to work 22 using col c repeat step 21 twice more the armhole shaping from now on you won t be working in the round but will 23 using col d repeat step 21 twice more be working back and forth over your stitches 24 increase round using col e ch3 ch1 sk1 dc1 into the next double_crochet st ch1 33 decrease row using col e and with the dc1 into the same double_crochet st ch1 right side of your work facing you sk1 hdc1 into the next double_crochet st insert your crochet hook into the 2nd ch1 sk1 h repeat the section inside double_crochet st from your previous round not the stars a further 21 22 24 26 counting the ch3 at the beginning times dc1 into the next double_crochet st of the round and pull through a ch1 dc1 into the
